borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission reference no: 2022/02555/FUL dated 16th November 2022 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension; erection of a part one part two storey rear extension at ground and first floor level; alterations to the front gable roof to include, installation of a porthole window to the front, and installation of 2no. rooflights to the side roofslopes; replacement of existing single glazed timber framed windows with new double glazed timber framed windows, to the front elevation; alterations to the side elevation of the main building to include, replacement of an existing window at second floor level, installation of a new window, repositioning, re-sizing and replacement of 2no. existing windows at first floor level, installation of a new window and a side access door at ground floor level; installation of a green roof on top of the proposed first floor back addition; installation of a new window to replace existing, to the rear elevation at first floor level; installation of an air conditioning condenser unit in the rear garden, on top of the hardstanding slab to the front elevation of the existing single storey outbuilding.' Amendments sought are removal of the window to the side elevation, single large glazed opening replaced with 2no. openings for rear garden access, change solid timber side door replaced with glazed door, minor changes to locations of windows to the side elevation, French doors changed to sash windows to rear elevation at first floor level, removal of the rooflight in mansard to rear and readjustment of setting out of dormers, and rooflight to first floor reduced in size.
